name: BootLegging Bellhop
description:
At Bootlegger Cove, being the Bellhop takes on new meaning.  As you manufacture unlicensed Liquor in the basement, you must sneak around the hotel and deliver your hooch undetected.  Can you supply the thirsty guests without getting caught?

This game was developed at the Buffalo Game Space Game Jam XIV May 17-20.

48 hours to make a game based on "breaking the law!"

The hotel was designed to have 6 floors, 3 where eliminated because of time constraints.  This game has potential but I do not know if I will continue to develop it further.
